fields.title: Answer
fields.value:
Please read these resources before staking SNX:

[How to Stake - Synthetix Community Docs](https://synthetix.community/docs/how-to-stake)

[What you need to know before staking SNX for the first time - Synthetix Blog](https://blog.synthetix.io/what-you-need-to-know-before-staking-snx-for-the-first-time/)
